WHG

Class LevelOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • WHG.LevelOne

  • public class LevelOne
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to draw level one on the screen to be played.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LevelOne(Square s)
      Initialization constructor to initialize the array lists and the square.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBall(Ball a, Ball b, Ball c, Ball d)
      This method adds multiple balls in the array list in one call.
      void addUpdateable(Updateable u1, Updateable u2, Updateable u3, Updateable u4, Updateable u5)
      This method adds multiple walls in the array list in one call.
      void addWall(Wall w1, Wall w2, Wall w3, Wall w4, Wall w5, Wall w6, Wall w7, Wall w8, Wall w9, Wall w10, Wall w11, Wall w12, Wall w13, Wall w14, Wall w15, Wall w16)
      This method adds multiple walls in the array list in one call.
      void checkCollide()
      This method goes through each array list of objects and checks collisions between all of them.
      void drawAll(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
      This method draws all of the objects on the screen.
      boolean getCollide()
      This method gets the collision state between the square and the balls.
      void setCollide(boolean c)
      This method sets whether the collision should be on with the balls and the square or not.
      void updateAll(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas)
      This method updates the objects that need to be updated on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelOne

        public LevelOne(Square s)
        Initialization constructor to initialize the array lists and the square. It initializes all the walls and balls to be placed in the level as well.
        Parameters:
        s - is the square.

    • Method Detail

      • addBall

        public void addBall(Ball a,
                    Ball b,
                    Ball c,
                    Ball d)
        This method adds multiple balls in the array list in one call. It helps from having to call one method many times.
        Parameters:
        a - is one of the balls to be added to the array list.
        b - is one of the balls to be added to the array list.
        c - is one of the balls to be added to the array list.
        d - is one of the balls to be added to the array list.

      • setCollide

        public void setCollide(boolean c)
        This method sets whether the collision should be on with the balls and the square or not.
        Parameters:
        c - is the boolean that will be set to the instance variable.

      • getCollide

        public boolean getCollide()
